properties.name: Background Color
properties.desc: The background-color property sets the background color of an element.

properties.name: Background Image
properties.desc: The background-image property sets an image as the background of an element.

values.desc: Specifies the image path.
No background image.

properties.extraDesc: You can also set gradients as backgrounds using linear-gradient or radial-gradient.

properties.name: Background Repeat
properties.desc: The background-repeat property controls whether and how the background image repeats.

values.desc: Repeats the image both horizontally and vertically.
Repeats the image horizontally.
Repeats the image vertically.
No repetition.
Repeats the image with equal spacing between images.
Repeats the image, scaling it to fit without clipping.

properties.name: Background Size
properties.desc: The background-size property specifies the size of the background image.

values.desc: Default size, image is displayed at its original size.
Scales the image to cover the entire element.
Scales the image to be fully visible within the element.
Width and height specified as percentages of the containing element.

properties.name: Background Position
properties.desc: The background-position property sets the initial position of the background image.

values.desc: Aligns the background image to the top.
Aligns the background image to the bottom.
Aligns the background image to the left.
Aligns the background image to the right.
Centers the background image.
Positions the background image at 10px from the left and 20px from the top.
Positions the background image at 50% from the left and 50% from the top.

properties.name: Background Attachment
properties.desc: The background-attachment property determines whether the background image scrolls with the page or is fixed.

values.desc: Background scrolls with the content.
Background stays in place when the content is scrolled.
Background scrolls with the content of the element.

properties.name: Background Clip
properties.desc: The background-clip property defines how far the background should extend within an element.

values.desc: Background extends to the outside edge of the border.
Background extends to the edge of the padding.
Background extends to the edge of the content.

properties.name: Background Origin
properties.desc: The background-origin property specifies the positioning area of the background image.

values.desc: The background image starts at the border edge.
The background image starts at the padding edge.
The background image starts at the content edge.

properties.name: Background Shorthand
properties.desc: You can combine several background properties using the shorthand background.
properties.valueDesc: The shorthand includes properties in the following order:

values.desc: Sets the background color.
Sets the background image.
Sets how the background image repeats.
Sets whether the background image is fixed or scrolls with the content.
Sets the position of the background image.
Sets the size of the background image.
Sets how far the background extends within the element.
Sets the positioning area of the background image.

properties.name: Multiple Backgrounds
properties.desc: CSS allows you to layer multiple background images on an element by separating them with commas.
properties.extraDesc: The first background specified is on top, and the last one is at the bottom.
